Package main.java.com.spaceexplorer.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
main.java.com.spaceexplorer.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the Space Explorer game. Players can explore sectors, collect resources, manage inventory, and interact with various space objects in the game world.
Since:
1.0
